General.Name: Beijing Fjr Optoelectronic Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Fjr Optoelectronic Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures infrared thermal imaging movement components and photoelectric sensors in China. The company offers gas detectors, refrigeration thermal imagers, and industrial temperature measurement products. Its products are used in security monitoring, homeland security, industrial testing, industrial temperature measurement, fire search and rescue, vehicle assisted driving, and scientific research. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Beijing, China.

3.Name: Mr. Yibin  Li
3.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board & Director
